_source.text: africa is a photographer's paradise....you can keep going back to the same site everyday and see different things each time but truly, PATIENCE-NO MATTER HOW UNCOMFORTABLY YOU'VE POSITIONED YOURSELF, IS MAJOR..... the more you observe animal behavior, the better your shots because you learn to anticipate what that lion is going to do in the next second.....
